The 'Mil Mi-17' (also known as the 'Mi-8M' series in Russian service, NATO
reporting name "'Hip'") is a Russian helicopter currently in production at two
factories in Kazan and Ulan-Ude. It is a medium twin-turbine transport
helicopter that can also act as a gunship.
